content: Lifestyle Asked by ErvinAsked on 02 Jun 2019Has anyone here done a cost comparison of the various self storage services available within Singapore?Could y'all enlighten me on the costs of different self-storage services in Singapore? Looking to find a worth it and reliable option!1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Sarah Chan, Business Administration at NUSLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 08 Jun 2019Hey there Ervin!There're plenty of storage options in Singapore. To determine the cost of each, you have to confirm the following variables first:Duration of storageSize of storage spaceLocation of storage (i.e. which outlet is most convenient for you)After determining the following, you can then get a quote from the various storage providers. I would personally recommend the following 3 because I've heard around that they're the most reliable ones:Extra SpaceLock and StoreLove It? Store It!Hope i helped! :-)1 comment2
Ervin08 Jun 2019Thanks Sarah!  At least this will help me to narrow down my search.  There are so many options in the market now, really confusing.
